alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Lee; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dougherty, western Turner, eastern Lee and northern Worth Counties through 400 PM EST... At 323 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Desoto to 7 miles east of Leesburg to 8 miles northwest of Baconton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Albany, Putney, Ashburn, Leesburg, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Poulan, Walker, Worth, Terrell, Warwick, Chokee, Stocks, Radium Springs, Forrester, Amboy, Lockett Crossing and Sylvester Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for south central and southwestern Georgia.
